# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## 1.5.0 - 2020-10-06
### Added
- Nextcloud 20 deprecations and removals

## 1.4.0 - 2020-04-14
### Added
- Nextcloud 19 deprecations and removals

## 1.3.0 - 2020-04-14
### Added
- Nextcloud 18 deprecations

## 1.2.0 - 2020-04-14
### Changed
- Dependency updates
### Fixed
- Detection of globals
